title: bhArata nannADu
sahitya:
bhArata nannADu pazham pugazh ponnADu pArinil uyar nADE palavar nirainADE


anupallavi

  pUraNa sutantirattal polivuga nADE shOkamum nal tyAgamum porundiya tiru nADE


caraNam    arum kuDiyAkkiyumE amaindiDavum pirandAi anaittulagam viyakkum arum balamum niraindAi
peru munivan gAndhiyin pEragam koL nADE bhEdaminri vAzhum nIdam sEr nADE
